titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DIVISION OF THE QUESTION - Mr. Putnam demanded that the question be divided. Agreed to by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the portion of the resolution electing the Chaplain. Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Passed House without amendment. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Karen L. Haas as Clerk; (2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James M. Eagen, III as Chief Administrative Officer; and (4) Father Daniel P. Coughlin as Chaplain.
